title: The Himbos Podcast w/ Josh Adam Meyers & Justin Silver: Manscaping
description:
The Bonfire Presents: Himbos with Josh Adam Meyers & Justin Silver! Today's episode: Manscaping

Making Himbros and Bimbros More Awesome

Thought Himbos were nothing more than one dimensional, womanizing, egomaniac gym rats with sick tans? Well get ready to have the hair pomade slapped off your meticulously sculpted dome-quaff as self prodding comedians Josh Adam Meyers and Justin Silver redefine the term, taking you on a hilarious journey of self improvement for the body, mind and soul. Join them and their guests as they explore dating, fitness, personality tests, expert makeovers, anti aging protocols, philosophy, sex and science with their heartfelt banter that reveals the real sinue beneath the Himbo Physique

@JoshAdamMeyers www.JoshAdamMeyers.com

@IAmJustinSilver www.IAmJustinSilver.com

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (josh Adam meyers, Justin silver)
